alert.note: Alert for Central Horry; Northern Horry (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wilmington (Northeastern South Carolina and Southeastern North Carolina - Wilmington)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 05 at 2:59PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Horry County through 345 PM EDT... At 259 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles west of Green Sea, or 9 miles southeast of Mullins, moving north at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Conway, Horry, Tabor City, Loris, Hickory Grove, Galivants Ferry, Homewood, Adrian, Hammond, Goretown, Bayboro, Allsbrook, Green Sea, Aynor and Loris Community Hospital. This includes SC Highway 22 between mile markers 1 and 22. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
